entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
